DATED MATERIAL, SUBJECT TO CHANGE. PLEASE CONSULT CURRENT UCSD GENERAL CATALOG FOR ANY ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.


Critical Gender Studies 2A and 2B are required courses for the major. CGS 2A will provide a general introduction to the key terms, issues, and concepts in the fields of gender and sexuality studies. CGS 2B will provide an introduction to the social relations of power that are shaped by and that shape gender and sexuality. It will build more on the basic concepts and skills introduced in CGS 2A.


Additional information on the major and the minor may be found at the website: http://cgs.ucsd.edu/
